venue.name: Lucky Dog Day Care (Inside the Pawsitive Canine Camp building)

item.description:
This month we'll be having our meet-up at Gruden & Diesel's doggy day care in Milford (Lucky Dog Day Care). The cost is only $5 per doggie!

The building has an open back door so the dogs can go in or out and lots of toys to play with.

If you'd like to attend, please "RSVP" yes to this event. Directions to the location are below!
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
DIRECTIONS:

Lucky Dog Day Care
Inside the Pawsitive Canine Camp building
80 Sumner St
Milford

Rt. 495 south to Exit 20 (Rt 85)
Take a Right off the exit.
At the first set of lights (Wendy's will be on right) take a right onto Dilla Street
Take first left (less than 1 mile, immediately after lake) onto Sumner Street
Pawsitive Canine Camp is the first bldg on the right.
Parking is immediately after the bldg on the right.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
